title: Some summoner character face icons missing during champ select.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I've tried reinstalling and it didn't fix it. What should I do about this? When I'm in ranked and people are selecting their bans, I can't see who's banning what unless they ban ezreal, fiddlesticks, etc.

replies.body: It looks like your game assets are failing to load.  While cases like this can be related to connection, there's also a chance that your game files are corrupt.  I recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and performing a force repatch.  This should fix up any bad files, then test it in a custom to be sure!
